feature1.explanation: Both texts use similar punctuation styles including commas and periods.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit consistent use of formal language and similar vocabulary choices.

feature3.explanation: Both texts have comparable sentence structures in terms of length and complexity.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were observed in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistency in punctuation, vocabulary, sentence structure, tone, and absence of spelling errors, there is a moderate level of confidence that the two texts were written by the same author.
